content.detailedDescription:
my camera was set up to take time lapse, one photo every minute. when reviewing later that night i saw this image in one frame. the location is 35 ave. and lower buckeye rd. in phoenix looking south over the estrella mnts. 9:50 am.
  i also have collected some anomalous fibers falling from the sky both in town and way out in the desert. i have examined the fibers under 20x magnification, ultraviolet light, and side by side with cotton and spider/cobwebs. it is some strange stuff. feel free to contact me by e-mail or phone after 4pm. *(wit's name and phone number removed--cms/sg)if you have any questions. 
  the first photo is as taken and the other two are cropped and enlarged 2x with photo editor in picasa. i will send some pictures of the anomolous fibers in a second e-mail.
content.summary: Anomolous light in time-lapse series of pictures

content.detailedDescription: I was on my front porch when i saw a huge star in the sky which i thought must be a planet because it was so bright . i didnt think much about it until i noticed that it was slowly moving towards me and thats when it got weird , i told myself that it must be a incomming flight , due to we have alot of jets in the area from miramar base . when it got close enough i knew it wasnt something that i have ever seen before, this craft was big and it only had a low hum comming from it . as it came over i yelled for my son to come see it, and he brought my binoculars so i could get a better look at it , boomerang shape ,three huge lights ,one on each tip and one on the front very big lights....... and it just cruised over my house ... when i couldnt see it anymore i went to the backyard so i would be able to watch some more , but it was gone , which is very strange because my backyard has a wide view of the sky ...I felt like i cought a ufo , top secret  or extra terrestial not sure but very exiting!!
content.summary: The object flew over my house at a moderate speed with very little sound

content.detailedDescription:
Wednesday, december 8, 2010, 18:22 hrs.

while driving from our home near breckenridge, to eastland, texas (which is approximately a 30 mile drive for us), my spouse and i saw unusual lights in the sky.

we were traveling south on hwy 183 and it was at approximately the 12 mile mark south of breckenridge, that i noticed a short string, of what appeared to be "christmas lights".  at this time of year that is certainly not unusual but what was, is that these lights were at some distance, located to our south/southwest and about 10 degrees above the horizon.  there is no hill there from my vantage point, no house and no towers.  the lights were clearly elevated some distance above the ground and may have been over, or near i-20, possibly west of cisco, texas.  at that distance it was hard to discern.

i was in the passenger seat, so i leaned forward to get a better look through the windshield.  the lights were clearly visible for about 5 seconds, until my view was momentarily blocked by trees.  when we passed the stand of trees, i was able to see the lights again. unfortunately, another stand of trees again blocked my view and after only 4 or 5 seconds to clear the trees, the lights were gone.  they didn't just move away, they were simply gone.  total viewing time was about 10 seconds.

i asked my husband if he saw the lights and he answered yes, however, he thought the lights might have been an aircraft, as he only got a glimpse of them.  he was having to pay attention to the road.

i could not be so dismissive, as i had clearly seen the lights, which appeared to look like multicolored christmas lights in a slightly elliptical, horizontal pattern, as depicted in my illustration.

i might also add that i had just emailed a friend before we left home, telling him that we might see a ufo. later, the lights appeared right after i thought to myself, "ok, show yourselves."  evidently someone, or something heard me but they didn't show for long.

1. we were driving to eastland, for a meeting.
2. we noticed the object (lights) due to the fact that they suddenly appeared in the sky ahead of us and were quite distinct.
3. i won't say what i thought it was but i can say what it wasn't.  it was not a conventional aircraft, an hallucination, venus, swamp gas, weather balloon or the goodyear blimp.
4. the object hung in the sky, 10 degrees above the horizon.  it's lights flashed and/or rotated around it's outer perimeter.  the lights looked like multicolored christmas lights.  the object appeared to be disc shaped, seen edge on and slightly tilted.
5. i was not surprised, as i knew it would be there, somewhere and we would see it.
6. we watched it until we lost sight of it behind trees and then it was gone.  

i did not have time to take a photo, therefore i am enclosing my depiction of what we saw.
content.summary: Spouse and i saw what appeared to be "christmas lights" in sky near cisco, tx

content.detailedDescription: Just got home about 8 or9 oclock.As my wife and her mother and my self, i noticed a group off 5 lights .Huge lights. the houston airport jets were taking off and they had to turn quickly, to avoid. this things lights that the jet marker lights,where about the size of a pencil,the lights of the ufo where like the size of the full moon. huge there were5 lights moving very slow as it moved away about 1 hour the lights were in no hurry .Also it was about half the horizon .My wife and mother in law .Were amazed at the size.My wife just retired from army .She can tell distance and size prettygood. she said just one of lights had to be 900 feet.At least,camparing the ufo lights and the commercial jets taking off .Lasted about one hour.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Just got home i noticed large lights 5.Huge lights .The houston airport planes were taking off and vering from the thing.

content.detailedDescription:
I was about 13 years old when this occured. we lived in the country. our entire family had been out on a shopping trip. when we arrived home and exited from the car, my father pointed to the south and exclaimed "look there." we all (8 of us) turned and saw this ring of rotating lights slowly drifting over the top of the trees to the south, and over the top of us, moving from south to north. it made no sound. the air was still,and the sky was clear.It blocked out the stars as it went over head. my father went to get a small telescope we had, while the rest of us remained outside. i got the impresion that it was so close i could have hit it with a rock if i threw one. none of us spoke. my father came out of the house with the scope, but by that time it was across the road and was drifting slowly away. all he could see with the scope was a blur of lights. we watched it drift away untill it was just a dot of light.
we didnt talk of it after that. not even the next day. it was like it hadnt happened. 10-15 years later, i brought it up at a family get together, and was suprised to find that only my younger brother and i can remember the event.
content.summary: Rotating ring of lights, aprox. 30-40  ft. in diameter.

content.detailedDescription: My son in law and myself were deer hunting near placerville, idaho around 11:15am on november 27, 2010. it was a clear day with some cloud cover and about 38 degrees. there was no deer/elk to be found or even a chipmonk or squirrel. i thought that was a bit odd since this area is teaming with wildlife. in fact, the whole time we were in that valley it felt as if someone was watching us. normally that doesn't bother me due to the fact that this area is overrun with mining claims and people tend to watch their mines closely, but this day was different. after hunting for awhile i was getting bored and decided to snap a few pictures of the beautiful scenery. at the time i hadn't noticed anything out of the ordinary ( except no wildlife ), however when i got home and downloaded the pictures off my camera, a canon powershot a550 7.1, i noticed something that i hadn't seen with my own eyes on the picture! after zooming in i got a sick feeling when i saw the disk in my picture. normally a sky watcher, i was startled to see this thing that i could not identify. i am a retired military man who has worked with aircraft my whole life. in fact while stationed on aircraft carriers, one of my "jobs" was to identify aircraft on approach during launch and recovery cycles. i have never seen anything like what was on this picture that i had taken. i haven't been back to that area since !
content.summary: Metallic disc in hunting pictures over mountain

content.detailedDescription:
I encountered "it/them" while swimming off the ca. coast.
to much to type . . . .
this is no hoax!
i would like to talk to someone about my encounter.
i swam to catalina (documentable) i prefer to remain annonymous.
you won't believe me, so i am willing to subject myself to any lie detector test as an annonymous subject.  ! i have never talked about "it" 
anyone interested in a good damn story, please contact me
quantumexistence@hotmail.Com
patronize me if you wish, i only want to talk about my psychosis.
content.summary: Green/white pulsating

content.detailedDescription:
At approx 7:45 pm pdt i was driving southbound i-15  five miles south of corona, ca. just passed temescal canyon rd exit, spotted what first appeared to be three lights in a delta formation heading directly towards me. altitude estimated 3,000 above ground based on mountain range reference parallel to the interstate. i knew this was not a conventional configuration so i immediately pulled over onto the shoulder about 1/2 mile south of temescal canyon rd. i exited my vehicle and observed three pairs of lights, each pair blue and red, in a delta configuration move relatively fast, not supersonic but amazingly smooth and fast, almost directly overhead in a northwest/north direction. as it flew overhead the sets of lights appeared to be embedded in a flat surface shaped in a "boomerang" shape body. each light was ring shaped, not solid oval. there was a pair of lights on each "wing tip" as well as the leading tip. the lights were not blinking or strobing. there was no apparent navigation light system as expected in conventional aircraft. lights remained solid.
it took about 20 seconds for the lights to reach overhead from the moment i sighted them, and i observed the object for an additional 3-4 minutes as it eventually faded out of site. what was impressive was that it banked slightly to the left at times as a single solid object and it appeared massive because even as its lights waned in the distance it did not "shrink" in size as it got farther away. 

a good way to describe how big it was when over my head is to raise your hands above your head and spread them apart about 3 feet. that was the span from wingtip to wing tip. 

i was alone, however there was another car who had pulled over about 200 meters ahead of me at the same time and it appeared they were observing it as well. the remained there as long as i did, and i attempted to approach them to ask them if they had observed the same object, but they left the scene as i approached them in my car.

at 7:55pm pdt i texted a friend with my cell phone about my sighting and then i continued on for home. i live approx 5 miles south of where my sighting was.

although i had a video capable cell phone, i was not able to have enough time to get my composure and get a video of the object.
content.summary: Boomerang object - three pairs of lights - each pair blue and red - massive size - moving south to north

content.detailedDescription:
Ufo report winter 1997


i was in the cow fields of nevada in winter 1997. i was with some people who took me there. next i hear a whistleing sound and a group of lights from the sky. it was fast and it happened that i fainted. i think it was a ufo.  i saw that something like a vortex came from the stars and i could see what appeared to be the stars and everything around it like a drop of water bouncing off more water, it looked like a chandelier.  i was so amazed. i have always had so much respect for the intergalactic and the planet mars. and i know so much about these things.  i love the universe and it amazes me this happened to me.  i will never forget about the universe. i saw it come at me and then i forgot.  maybe i fainted for a good reason.  maybe the universe is not as big as it looks.
content.summary: This might have been an abduction.

content.detailedDescription: standing on the back porch and looking up at the sky, when 6 to 10 orange colored object flew over the north side of clarion pa. in a  eastenly direction at high speed. there was no sound and no one around to verify the sighting. the formation was not a tight v shape but loose,as the objects flew away the formation completely stay close but not in v formation, but refomed into v shape
content.summary: ^6  to 10 orange colored objects, in v shap formation, flying east at high speed

content.detailedDescription:
Approximately 12:45 am november 12, 2010 i stepped out my back door to video a light i saw in the sky behind the houses in the rear of my yard.  i had also seen the strange light two nights prior and purchased the 3500x zoom camera used here in case i saw it again.  sure enough it returned the night i got this footage.  (the object was fairly stationary but i was having a hard time keeping it in focus with such a high zoom so the camera was moving around a lot)

i zoomed in to take a look and all i could tell in my screen was a ball of orange light and saw it flashing a few times so i just kinda assumed it was a plane and i wasn't getting a focused picture.  i also filmed an airplane passing close to it which passed right over me.  as you can see, the plane was clearly a plane and the camera operated quite well.  it wasn't until i played the video back on my 50 inch high def television set that i realized what the object was.  this was about five days ago.  i toggled the whole video frame by frame and made some startling revelations as well which are only clear in particular frame.  my conclusion are as follows:

 1.) it is clearly a saucer shaped object sitting atop a glowing fireball

2.) near the end of the video around minute marker 2:18 it started flashing a white light.  in one particular frame at minute marker 2:20 the ufo is at the lower right of the screen and flashes or "blips" an image next to itself which looks like the object in black and white like a film negative.  even stranger in this frame, on my bigscreen you can clearly see a blue have above the object and inside the haze you can clearly see about eight houses and what appears to be two people standing in the front in the lower right of the haze.  i took a photo up close with my cellphone from the television screen of one of the houses and the people and emailed it to myself, and sure enough in full screen mode of my computer you can see a large white house, the outline of the roof and windows, and in the front the image of a long blond haird thin woma standing facing away from me and a man sitting in front of hear.  you can see this haze and the houses in a circular fashion in the video on the computer while watching the viseo, but only on the bigscreen is it large enough to make out the details.

i concluded this might be a wormhole above the ufo that opened up when it blipped and the images inside it might be in another place and time.

in other frames such as one in minute marker 1:07 it the craft is focused enough and the flames are subsided enough that you can see what appears to be windows in the ring near the top of the craft and on the bigsreen it appears to have 4 little white heads and bodies standing there.  i snapped a picture of this with my cellphone to and sent it to my email and it also looks very clearly to be heads and bodies inside the window.

3.) from the frames that show the houses behind my house below the object you can see the object didn't travel very far across the sky in the two or three minutes i filmed it.  it seemed to be traveling much too slow to be any type of aircraft.  it seems it would have fallen out of the sky.

i don't have anyway to send the video with this post because i dont have it in a form, other than you tube, to send it.

i did send some pictures from my cellphone to the "wilder" woman from mufon, but she said she couldnt make anything out and she was going on a thirty day leave and to contact mufon directly.

i did send the video via "you tube to the email address for the director of mufon a few moments ago @ *(email address removed--cms/sg)  since this was one of the only ways i could figure out to get you the video and i asked him to forward it to you for my file.

feel free to contact me if you would like to research the actual video that is still located in my video camera in its original condition.

i am anxious to see this object in more refined detail.  especially the objects in the wormhole and the heads and bodies in the windows
content.summary: Shot footage of saucer shaped ufo sitting atop a flashing ball of fire drifting southeast slowly .  also caught airplane flying past it in video

content.detailedDescription: At 6:35 pm, i was driving south on highway 183 towards cisco.  about three miles north of cisco, a round object appeared directly in front of me over the highway.  a series of white lights went on and off in succession all the way around the object.  it took about 4 seconds for the lights to go around the object.  the object appeared to be stationary.  the object did not reappear.
content.summary: Round object w/ lights appears above hwy 183 three miles north of cisco, texas.

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were traveling on i-4 towards orlando headed to st. augustine for the weekend. we were talking to a friend on the phone and were around plant city, fl. we had reached a part of the interstate where the wasn't really any exits to get off and nothing around us but farmland and trees. as we were talking to our friend i had noticed an object in the sky. i thought nothing of it at first and did not mention it. i assumed it was a helicopter, because if the lights. it had a blue, green and red light flashing at the bottom of it. as we continued our conversation i kept my eye one it, because really there was nothing else to look at. my first thought was that it looked odd because it seemed to not move, but then again being in a car moving 70 mph can do that. at this point it was at my passenger window (my husband driving) i looked away and then looked back and was bewildered. the flashing light were gone and there were very bright golden colored lights flashing across the object. the lights moved clockwise, then counter-clockwise around the object. the object did not appear to be moving and was hovering in a field just above the tree line. the best way i could describe it was if you imagined light panels flashing across a disc. this would continue for a moment and then stop, followed by the green, blue and red flashing lights coming back on. i immediately told my husband to look and we watched it for about 2 minutes. there wasn't much traffic on i-4 but the cars around us slowed down, i could see the driver next to us looking at the object. we all slowed down to about 50 mph, which on a florida highway is rare. as we continued to drive the object moved farther and farther up, we watched it from miles away until we lost sight of it completely. i have never seen anything in the sky look like this. i am highly skeptical about ufos, and i think most things can be explained. this was nothing normal. whatever this was didn't mind being seen, or why else would it have been so close to a main highway on a friday night. it was very bizarre and of course now we are very curious as to what we saw. i wished we could have taken a picture but of course, the camera was in the truck with our luggage:(
content.summary: Flashing green, blue, and red light followed by horizontal golden lights flashing left to right across object

content.detailedDescription:
I stepped out back for a smoke after dinner, and looked up into the sky as i always do at night.  i've become accustomed to the usual stars and aircraft flight paths.  there is an airport in the area, but i would definitely recognize a plane.

when i looked up, i noticed three blue/green lights almost in a vertical line.  the middle light was slightly off to the right, creating a very thin triangle.  they were oscillating as if to be twinkling stars.  as i said, i know the normal stars i see every night, and these were not them.

i also noticed three similar lights in a more pronounced triangle approximately 20-30 degrees to the left.  they behaved the exact same way.  they were not moving and did not appear to get closer or further away.

i stood outside and watched them for about an hour before all 6 lights disappeared at the exact same time.  they did not fade out or zoom off out of sight.  they simply disappeared.

as i said, i look to the sky every night to see if anything abnormal is there.  this is the first time i have ever seen anything out of the ordinary.  i'm very creeped out right now.  to add to that, my tv signal just went out.  coincidence?  probably.  creepy given what i just saw?  absolutely.
content.summary: 3 lights in large triangle

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home from work and looked over and seen this fire ball looking thing with looked like two tails coming off of it i then called the my wife and told her to go outside and start recording it then i pulled up to the house a minute later then took over recording it on her samsung galxy phone i couldnt get the phone to zoom in at the time and then the object started going down behind some clouds i have seen this type of object all over the internet and this is my second time seeing it in person the first time was down in louisiana a month ago before seeing this object the wife also toldme she heard a sonic boom right before i called her and the dogs were barking crazy i have a little more footage on my sony cam corder i havent got that up loaded yet if any one else has seen this same object please let me know what you think
content.summary: Firey ball type after loud sonic boom

content.detailedDescription:
I was in bed looking north east over the st. claire river toward canada.  it was about 2 in the morning and i was next to my boyfriend.  i am familiar with the skyline and the stars, and spend a lot of time with my nexstar telescope looking at the sky from this exact location.  i was surprised to see, however, that there was what at first appeared to be a really large star where there had never been one before.  it was bright orange, round, and very large though i could tell from the horizon and the island that it was pretty far away from us.  at least a few miles off.

i asked my boyfriend if he saw it and he said that he did.  at first i thought maybe it could be a star or a planet, because sometimes they appear quite large.  however both my boyfriend and i agreed that it was too big and way too bright to be a planet.  i stared at it with him for at least two minutes, and during that time the orange sphere hovered, then moved up and then down and then slightly up toward the south east direction, then stopped and hovered again.  

at this point i was pretty frightened, so i ran to get my brothers.  they came to the window and we all watched it, where it hovered for a moment and then took off moving up into the air while racing towards the south east corner of the sky until it disappeared behind the clouds.  it moved faster than any flying object that i have ever seen, and it made absolutely no noise.  one of my brothers was particularly unnerved by how silent the craft was, especially because it moved so fast.  

the appearance was not like a fireball.  ive never believed in ufos or ufo sightings, but after we saw this we did some research into similar sightings.  unlike most others that see an orange ball, the sphere that i saw did not seem to be on fire or anything like that.  it didnt spark or change color either. instead, the sphere we saw was very bright, orange, and consistent in its brightness.  it was circular, and seemed to have relatively defined edges, though it was really far away.  it was the weirdest, creepiest thing i have ever seen.  

after it sped away, and disappeared, it did not come back.  but some weird things started happening after it was gone, on the canadian side across the river.  first, the wind picked up like crazy, blowing from the north east/ east toward the south west/west and it was blowing so hard that our windows were rattling in the wind.  the wind actually made waves appear on the river.

also, after the sphere sped off, a bunch of strange white lights began to blink on and off across the inland area of the canadian inland that we can see from the window.  they looked like those lights on towers that blink to warn airplanes, but they were much shorter and the light was white not red.  the canadian area is an indian reservation and the part of the reservation where the lights were blinking is only sparsely inhabited and mostly just used for fishing and hunting (the residents live elsewhere on  as it is a really big area).  i didnt even know there were lights on that part of the reservation to blink, as i have never seen them before (and i have been living in the area for 18 years).

even weirder, downriver a spotlight or flood light kept flashing from what appeared to be a boat out on the water.  i looked through binoculars but could not tell if the light was from a boat on the water or from a house that is right on the river's edge on the canadian shore further to the south east.  the light blinked on and off sporadically with no discernible pattern.  i have never seen anything like it, though i think i should mention that we are relatively near to selfridge air force base.  mind you, this was thanksgiving and it was 2 in the morning, and it was freezing cold outside. 

lastly, and it was my boyfriend who pointed this out, there was a weird absence of freighters before and after the appearance and disappearance of the sphere.  typically, a lot of freighters come by on the st claire river, even in november (they dont usually stop running, if ever, until january or until the ice is too thick).  they come by on average every 15 minutes to 30 minutes.  thanksgiving evening, just a few hours before the sighting, had been particularly busy with freighters and i remember that because my cousin kept calling out every time a freighter went by all throughout thanksgiving dinner and into the evening.  however, from 130 am to at least 30-40 minutes after the sighting (roughly 3 am or 3:10 am), not a single freighter, or any boat went by. we fell asleep around 3 and so there may not have been another freighter for an even longer period, though i can't confirm that.

i have never never seen anything like this before. i was so freaked out, i had to take a sleeping pill to actually go to sleep.  i know that i am not crazy or imagining things though, because my brothers saw it and my boyfriend did too.  in the morning, we looked up ufo thanksgiving 2010 on youtube and someone from portland oregon posted a video of a sphere very similar to what we saw the same night, all the way across the united states in michigan.  the coincidence is uncanny.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Bright orange sphere

content.detailedDescription: My father was in the air force. we moved frequently. we moved to colorado springs, father stationed at ent air force base. house was offbase in residential area. could see opening to norad mtn. from back yard. approx 1.5 to 2 miles away. i was 12 years old at the time. just walked out the front door and stood in front yard. across the street about 30 feet above the neighbors house was a ufo. it was fairly large, about the size of 1.5 school buses. it was a disc. the dome on top was more square like, sort of like a top hat but a little shorter. the craft was black. the dome had large windows that took up nearly all of the dome. there were lights on inside and i could see dark shadowy humanlike figures looking out at me. there was no noise. there was no visible means of how it was hovering at maybe 1 or 2 mph. there was a distinct calmness in the air or atmosphere that surrounded the craft and reached out to my distance enveloping me. as i recall the atmosphere that i was in was kind of orangish to look through. things moved almost in slow motion. i looked to my right and the neighbor next door was standing in the yard staring at this object also. she also seemed to move very slow and animated. she was an elderly woman visiting from germany and spoke no english. as i looked away from this woman to again look at the ufo it wasn't there. things (sight and atmosphere) had cleared up and stuff was moving at normal speed again. i thought it had left, or i was seeing things. but a quick glance down the street and it was there moving very slowly over somebody elses house. maybe five or six houses away. i have only told this story to about seven people, mostly family. my impression of this whole ordeal was that of a tour bus, except that it was a tour bus for aliens. it was close enough to hit with a rock. thats it! thanks.
content.summary: Watched ufo slowly move over house across street, tree top level, 100 feet away.

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving from grand rapids to detroit. i estimate five miles west of the fowlerville exit. i saw three lights that seemed somewhere between a star and a plane light in brightness. they were making a pretty large triangle, so they must have been decently far apart. i saw them driving and continued watching them, they didn't appear to move in any fashion. their height was just above the treeline. they then vanished.
this was the second time my girlfriend and i had witnessed this event, on the same stretch of freeway. same amount of lights and to my memory, same distances apart and locations (approximately).

they were to the south of me so my estimate was about 5 miles southwest of the fowlerville fairgrounds (that was the nearest exit on i-96.
content.summary: Three lights in sky hover and vanish. near fowlerville fairgrounds, i-96

content.detailedDescription:
This event took place in or around 1974, when i was in my mid teens. i have verbally told many people about it over the years, but have never put it down in writing till now, which is strange since i am a professional biography writer by career, also publishing paperbacks in the self-help genre.

the location was corby, northants, england. i'd been at a friend's house on occupation rd, and had cycled back to my home in argyll st, about half a mile away. i'd been putting my bike in the shed at the back of the house, and had been scanning the sky as was my habit. even then (and still the case today) i was a very keen aviation enthusiast. i was a senior nco in 422 sqdn air training corps, and often represented the sqdn in aircraft recognition. in those days i could identify just about every aircraft type flying!

on that occasion, i noticed a triangular formation of lights moving across the night sky from north to south. my natural assumption was that i was viewing an airliner as the speed across the sky would have been consistent with viewing a large aircraft at typical operating altitude in the fl360 area. it was a very clear night, and the moon was full and sitting high in the western sky. 

i noticed that the projected flightpath of these lights would take it very close to the bright full moon, so i decided to run into the house, grab my 20x50 binoculars, and wait to see if the aircraft would cross the face of the moon, thus allowing me a very clear silhouette by which to identify the type of aircraft. when i was in the house i told my dad about it, and he also came out to look.

when i came back outside, probably no more than 20-30 seconds after flying through the door on the run, i quickly found the lights again, and confirmed they were likely to cross the moon. i found them in the binoculars but was unable to see the aircraft shape, i also noticed the lights were white and steady, not flashing or coloured as i might have expected some to be on an aircraft. i remember moving my view to the left to see the full moon, and then back to the lights, and then, knowing they were going to converge, watching only the moon.

please remember that at this moment my expectation was to see a clear outline of a conventional aircraft against the bright, clear, full moon. what happened next has burned itself so clearly into my memory that it is as if it happened yesterday. while viewing the moon, at 20x power, it took up much of the viewfinder, but with enough black sky around it to clearly see "entry" and "exit" points where the aircraft would cross the surface. i knew it would be quick, but i had enough confidence in my identification ability that i knew i'd get the type of aircraft.

i watched the lights come into view from the right, but instead of giving a clear outline of an aircraft, those lights disappeared behind the surface of the moon. i continued to watch through the binoculars for maybe another five or ten seconds, but those lights never did re-appear to the left of the moon. i removed the binoculars from my eyes and scanned the clear night sky where an aircraft lights should have been if i had been watching an aircraft, it was gone.

both my late father and i were amazed at what we had seen, i moreso because i had witnessed this through the 20x50 binoculars. we both looked for the lights for several minutes but to no avail.

the next day, during classes at school, the best friend i had visited that night told me that he had seen something strange in the sky after i had left. he described the exact scenario i have outlined above, but he brought up the subject, not me. we had independently seen the same thing, without communication, even though we were at our respective homes in town, a good half mile apart.

over the years i have often reflected on that sighting. it was my first ufo event. i have had several others since then, but nothing so amazing as what i witnessed in those mid teenage years. i was a credible, level-headed witness with a background in identifying aircraft types. i had expected to see nothing out of the ordinary, i had been using professional standard binoculars that had once belonged to the manager of the england football team, and my sighting was confirmed by my dad who watched it with me, and my buddy who saw it independently.

the speed of those lights must have been phenomenal as they crossed space and disappeared behind the surface of the moon. the deceleration must have been greater than our known technology even now would allow for. was it three objects or one? my impression has always been three, because the size of one object would have been unimaginable. i had no doubt as to my impression that these were controlled craft, then or now.  it was an amazing, perspective-altering sighting, which even now leaves more questions than it provides answers.
content.summary: Triangular formation of lights that disappeared behind the moon

content.detailedDescription: I was probably 10 years old when my grandfather gave me a paperback book on ufos. ever since then, i was interested in trying to find one. our family lived on 17th street in kansas city, ks in an older two-story home. the homes were about 100 years old and quite close together so there wasn't a lot of sky visible. one night about 11:00 pm when i was approximately 11 years old,i started looking at the sky out my front bedroom window. i sadly thought to myself, "i want to go home; i want to go home". then i thought...What do i mean? i am home! i then laid down on my bed so i could put my head on the window sill to see out the window on the side of my bedroom. i kept thinking to myself "i know you're out there somewhere, i can feel it". i continued back and forth between the two windows. i had noticed a bright star slightly to my left when looking out the side window. it was directly over the edge of the roof. i continued back and forth looking out both windows for about three hours. the last time i looked out the side window while lying on my bed, i had my head turned to the right looking up. then, something caught my eye and i turned my head to the left. the star that had been stationery for three hours had begun to move. it made a sideways "s" pattern and continued over the next door neighbor's house so i lost sight of it. tears came streaming down my temples. i felt as if i had been left behind. was the "s" for my name "suzanne"? i get agitated when no one believes me. they said "well, it must have been a helicopter or a satellite". that high up and stationery for three hours? i know what i saw and how i felt. i decided to finally report this because other people are coming forward with sightings from years ago. thank you for your time. sincerely, suzanne h
content.summary: Felt someone was out there

content.detailedDescription: Whilst searching for houses to let in the bristol area i came across this street view photo i copied it but the one on google earth has a lot more detail when u zoom in have a lookat the camera view on salcombe road bristol uk look at the cameras sayinying 37 salcombe road go to the ones near the cross roads and find house with door number 72 a lampost is in front of it and in the sky to the right is a large object on zooming in its a blueish colour boomarang round , with black in middle and sticky up ariel and a black dot. then look to the right of it till you reach the corner house front roof peaks there is two small objects could be birds or couls be stealth bommbers on close zoom maybe you can enhance the google photo beter but it is very odd looking and first object looks like its in sky away from lampost.Please email me back if you can with enhanced photo that you do as this is very interesting as i say the one im sending is a copy if u view on street view google earth there is a lot more detail. thanks
content.summary: Found on google earth

content.detailedDescription:
To out it simply i was closing my window after opening it for some air at around 5am before getting to sleep when i noticed a bright light which seemed to be across the street not too high up and on top of my neighbors house. at first i thought it was likely a planet case ive seen venus which looks much like a ufo too but i noticed it seemed to get brighter at one point and after looking it for maybe 3 minutes or so, it started to hover away.         also it was completely silent the whole time and i may have noticed a blinking or not blinking red light on the side of it that was opposite of what i can see.

my reactions were that it was a very interesting sighting,  it could have easily been a military craft but it seemed very odd that it was so low and also seemed to literally stop or hover in middle of the sky for some reason.  i happen to have an interest in ufo's which is why i noticed the light, i often keep my eyes out when i can.  i don't neccesarily believe or disbelieve in them but i have a high interest.   what this was i cant really say but it was certainly interesting.

it also seemed like it may have been pretty small and possible rectangle or boomerang type of shape, it was really hard to tell.   i lost sight of it when it drifted off past my house to were i couldn't see it and i was looking out my window the whole time.    i did keep quiet too when i saw it for my own safety in case it was somethng strange.

also worth noting is that it seemed to shut off its lights or appear invisible for a split second or two about two times as i recall.  it could have been because of clouds or wind but im sure its at least worth mentioning
content.summary: Saw bright light sitting in the sky for a few minutes until it turned and seemingly hovered away silently

content.detailedDescription: The object seen was viewed by appr. 20 of my customers over a 30 min. period of time and the last 10 secs or so with the crafts final departure was caught on video.
content.summary: Multiple witnesses to solid black object

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i, while sitting outside watching the stars, noticed a dark object flying toward us.  at first i thought it was a large bird then a kite, but as it went over head you could see it was a triangle with a dim light at each corner.  it was blocking out the stars as it went over. you could see the actual shape was a triangle with a notch out of the back.  i  thought perhaps it was a stealth bomber, only it was low to the ground and made no noise. it moved slow like you imagine a ufo would.  my wife is pretty hard to impress and she was like you need to contact those mufon people it was so real. the next day you rationalize it and say it was nothing just a plane or something, we will never know.  that was late october. then in late november about the same time 9:45 pm i see another triangular shaped craft. same flight pattern, only it had more lights this time, and before it could disappear from sight it made a hard left turn impossible for a plane.  i was shocked and couldn't believe my eyes. i ran in the house, told my wife and ran back out looking for it.  i never saw anything else but it was so real. i was uneasy about seeing a actual ufo. i tried to rationalize it again by thinking it must be a drone aircraft, maybe a new stealth model they are testing over southeastern oklahoma?  not too long after that, news reports came out of sightings that weren't too far away. i was encouraged to write this report. i hope it helps other people that have seen it to know they are not crazy, i saw it too.
content.summary: Triangular ufo sighting over se oklahoma

content.detailedDescription:
The object was in the treeline near our home and first spotted by my husband. we are used to seeing aircraft in the area as our town has a small airport. however, the flashing was far too bright for the usual craft and emitted colors we have not seen including a turquoise, purple and even green as i was watching. 

it hovered in the treeline for approximately 4 minutes and moved out of the treeline. this is still at 10:16 pm central standard time, ongoing. 

the object is slow moving appearing to move closer to our location and recede slightly. movement is not always slow but not entirely erratic either. it seems to be moving (at best guess) in a spiral motion. 

there are three witnesses in our household. i cannot attest to the neighborhood, as it is fairly quiet and others seem to be indoors. 

i am attempting to get photos and will be happy to send them to you once i have anything confirmed. at this point, i don't know how clear they will be.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Other
content.summary: Star-like, flashing, odd colors, hovering almost oscillating lights

content.detailedDescription: Ok myself and my dad watched these lights for 30 minutes, i was trying to pick them up on my camera this time but couldn't get them to show up, all you can hear is our commentary about seeing them. they appeared at first as a single light stayed on for a second or two then went out, came back on in the same exact part of the sky 10 minutes later this time it came on as 1 then a 2nd then a 3rd all very close to each almost appearing to be connected. then 2 military jets were circling the sky for 20 minutes, they were looping around in the area of the lights but not the exact area. you very rarely see jets here, all we have here is c-130 and b-1's. i looked for some sort of jet that would be near the lights dropping flares like people are claiming these to be, but the sky was empty. no planes in the area, no beacon lights of planes off in the distance. the way these lights and come on they aren't flares. they don't flicker at all they are perfectly round orange lights, people see the orange orbs all over the country so come on stop calling them flares. i know what im looking at and i know its not a flare.
content.summary: Orange lights

content.detailedDescription: I was exiting off of rt. 18 north on the rt 1 south exit ramp in my car. as i neared the bottom of the ramp and began to merge onto rt.1 south, i noticed a low-altitude object with three bright, constant white lights over the highway directly ahead of me. i thought at first it was a plane, but as i began to take a closer look the object, i noticed there were no red, green, or flashing white navigation lights visible as i neared the object. i was trying to get a better visual while also trying to steer my car so as not to crash, but this object was actually large enough and flying low enough that i was able to get a good look at it going 50 mph down the highway. it was triangular in shape with three bright white lights on each corner. the edges of the craft were illuminated slightly and there was also a red light either toward the center or the back of the craft that was also steady and not blinking. the object was headed in a northerly direction right over rt 1 as i was headed south. i am wondering if anyone else saw this object as there were quite a few people on the road when i witnessed this object. the sheer size of the craft was immense and i was reluctant to post this sighting until i did some research on large military cargo planes like the hercules, galaxy and globemaster. however, i do not believe that the object was any of these planes as there is no military base that i know of in the area of the sighting. secondly, i do not believe a military cargo plane would be devoid of proper navigation lights and flying at such a low altitude. please feel free to contact me if need be.
content.summary: Large triangular shaped object moving over rt 1 highway from south to north

content.detailedDescription:
I came to visit my parents from college that summer in 2004. 

the evening of that event began with me asking my father to use his hand-bike (it is sort of a bike that exercises your arms). i told him that i wanted to see the sunset and evening twilight meanwhile i ride around the community and then to the store to get some snacks. as i began my three and a half mile trek, i was heading east on el dorado parkway (a circumference road around the community). i didn't notice anything since i was focused on just riding and navigating the bike. when i reached the part of the road that starts heading west back to the entrance of the community, i took a break to drink some water since the tempature that evening was still in the 100s. meanwhile i was drinking some water, i looked up in the sky to look at the evening twilight and there above me approximately between 1000 to 2000 ft, i saw two or three diamond shaped objects glowing in a fiery red/orange/yellow color. there, i started to focus on the big one in the middle. 

all i have to say is that it was beautiful. i know it wasn't flares or weather ballons since i deal with them in the us army. they were staying in the same exact spot. i started to ride again, however, i kept my attention on them. in my mind, i started thinking that this is sort of something out of steven spielberg's "close encounters of the third kind." the objects kept their positions. as i neared the entrance of the community, i change my focus to the road and started to head back home. i wanted to tell my parents about my experience. i knew that i had my back to the objects when i got near my home. when i got home, i looked up again and they were gone.
content.summary: Biking and ufos

content.detailedDescription: We where driving home when i noticed a strange looking object in the sky,i told my fiancee to look and he said oh it is probably fighter jets to which i said they are sitting still in the sky and one looked liked a disc shaped and the other two looked long and bright but not moving, when he looked at them he yelled stop the car and that is what i did. we tried to take a picture with our camera phone but it would not show up,i pointed to the disc shape one and told him to try and get it, at that point that thing took off like nothing i have ever seen,it was there and then gone in an instant!!We continued to watch and then more showed up,we counted at least twelve, all following formation really really close to one another. we heard no sound coming from them and they where all headed south west.I finally got a little afraid and told my fiancee we where leaving the area. i have seen things in the past and regreted not telling someone, so i have tried to tell you everything that i could.
content.summary: The leader was disc shaped and the rest  was shaped like long bight  cigar shaped. they appeared to be in 3 squards.

content.detailedDescription: I stepped out on my back deck on my way out to work, still dark, but sky was beautifully clear and all the stars were so clear and beautiful so i stopped to look. looking to were venus was shining so brighty in the eastern sky. as i was looking suddenly a bright starlight object just popped into sight to the left and a little lower the venus. it was just as bright and shiny as venus and was moving in a slighly upward motion in the starfield. after moving past venus it sudden just disappeared from view pop and it was gone. a few seconds later it reappeared much higher up above venus where a few seconds before it was below it. it then moved off in a streak of light that was so fast my eyes could not track it . just the trail of light it left . it was no comet because it changed direction in at least a 45* angle. i don't know what it was but it wasn't anything i know of.
content.summary: Bright starlike object in eastern sky
